function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Economic activity effect on emissions","Impact":"Potential increase in emissions leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement policies for sustainable economic growth and emissions reduction","Technologies":"Monitoring and data analysis systems for emissions tracking","People":"General population","Owner":"Government agencies and policy makers"},{"Description":"Industrial economy structure effect on emissions","Impact":"Changes in industrial activity composition leading to fluctuations in emissions levels","Mitigation":"Transition to greener industrial practices and technologies","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources, waste reduction technologies","People":"Industrial sector workers, environmental organizations","Owner":"Industrial sector leaders, environmental regulators"},{"Description":"Emissions intensity effect on emissions","Impact":"Deterioration in sector-specific emission intensity leading to potential health risks","Mitigation":"Investment in energy efficiency and cleaner production processes","Technologies":"Energy-efficient machinery, sustainable production technologies","People":"Workers in emitting sectors, local communities","Owner":"Industry leaders, sustainability advocates"}]}
